In an effort to honor Memorial Day in the U.S., we will be making a *limited edition* charity bundle to benefit Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA) available in the store starting today. The bundle will contain the following items:
1 x Vermillion Core 1 x Scarbide Rack 1 x 30% Training Accelerator
This is a savings of nearly 200%!
When the sale concludes on Sunday June 2nd, 100% of the IAVA Charity Bundle’s net proceeds will be donated to Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America on behalf of the Kabam community! Thank you for your support!

Congratulations, Commander! It has been weeks of hard-fought battles, but we have finally put down the rampaging Terraknor. It should go without saying that between us and almost every other force on this planet that the Terraknor have been taken to extinction. No matter, as they were far too unstable for long term military application. That said, we have been able to re-purpose the Cerulea Controller items to be more general purpose, and I’ve already identified another specimen of Cerulean fauna that can be suitably….."weaponized":
I call it the Lancer!
Engineering Lab Force Tournament - 4x Boost!

Edgeworld has run into a few rough spots this week. Many players are ending up with upgrades or research stuck, receiving blank messages in their mail, or being forced to refresh the game every time they load.

The Edgeworld team really appreciates the patience of all our players, and the helpful and informative messages you've been sending us through our help desk. Our engineers have prepared a fix for the problem, and you should be seeing dramatic improvements by the end of the week. If you're still having problems, please send us a message using the 'Help' link beneath the game window.

As a gesture of thanks while we work through this, we're giving three Zoot Tokens to every player. Those Tokens will be added to your inventory automatically. Good luck, and thank you for playing Edgeworld!
Win a Cerulean Fireproof Shield Part!

Only a short while remains on this offer! Purchase any Platinum package of 1000 Platinum or greater and receive 3 FREE Incendiary Cores AND 3 FREE Modder’s Patches for the brand new Engineering Lab before 12:0 PM PDT August 31st!

Spend 1,000 Platinum and get a Level 10 Cerulean Meteoric Shield!
Spend 2,000 Platinum and get our biggest and baddest part, the Cerulean Network Sabotage at Level 10!
This deal will only be available for the next 24 hours so make those purchases count! Prizes will be awarded by August 31, 2013.

The BRAND NEW Equipment Part Crafting system has been released! By taking your Basic and Rare Equipment Parts and combining them with the new Crafting Alloys, you can get even stronger Rare and Cerulean Equipment Parts like the Cerulean Armor!
In order to access this new feature, click ‘View Equipment’ on your Engineering Lab building and the click the ‘Craft’ tab to find the new crafting recipes that you can use to make new Equipment Parts and Mystery Boxes. The Tier 1 Rare Part Box provides you with the lowest chance to get a Rare Equipment Part with 3 Bonuses, and that chance is increased dramatically through the Tier 3 Rare Part Box that GUARANTEES you a Rare Equipment Part with 3 bonuses! Each Rare Part Box has two crafting recipes, one that uses Basic Equipment Parts and one that uses Rare Equipment Parts, so be sure to check out the Craft tab in the Engineering Lab for more information on these recipes.
Start crafting Equipment Parts in your Engineering Lab today!
Introducing Sniper Turrets!

Get Ready for the upcoming 12-Hour FLASH E-Lab Force Tournament with the Hacker’s Patch Mystery Box!
You could win 10 Hacker’s Patches for the price of one!
This box guarantees you 1 Hacker’s Patch, but there is also a chance to win 2, 3, 5 or 10 Hacker’s Patches!
Get your Smart Parts upgraded in a flash!
This FLASH Force Tournament will begin at 12:00am PDT on October 15th and will end at 12:00pm PDT AND feature QUADRUPLED E-Lab Force Points!

Introducing General Hale! This new general was the result of Maar experimentation, a human implanted with Cerulean bionics and technology. She has the power to wreak havoc in a technology-driven battlefield!
Her Sabotage ability allows her to rip apart the circuitry of buildings and turrets at a distance, damaging them by a percentage of their health.
Hale's ultimate ability, Psionic Hack allows her to seize control of enemy turrets, turning the base's defenses against itself!
Hale will lend her calamitous power any Commander who has a General's quarters of level 12 or higher.
Check our official forums for more details including a full backstory!
2.5 Day Accelerator Sale!!!

In honor of the newly released Defense Simulator Campaigns for Levels 16 and 17, upgrade your Defense Simulator to Level 16 or 17 today to win Platinum and Ruby Cores!
Five randomly selected players that complete a Level 16 or higher Defense Simulator building upgrade between now and 11:00pm PST on June 30th will receive a Ruby Core! Players that have already upgraded their Defense Simulator to Level 16 will be included in this drawing as well.
Three randomly selected players that complete a Level 17 Defense Simulator building upgrade between now and 11:00pm PST on June 30th will receive 1,000 PLATINUM! Players that have already upgraded their Defense Simulator to Level 17 will be included in this drawing as well.
Prizes will be paid out to the winners within three business days. Don’t wait to upgrade your Defense Simulator to get a chance to win Platinum and Ruby Cores today!

Today is the last day to upgrade your buildings to Level 15 in preparation for upcoming events!
Each completed Level 15 building upgrade on one of your colonies by 11:00pm PDT on April 15th gives you a chance to take home great prizes! Ten randomly chosen players who successfully complete a Level 15 building upgrade will take home a Hacker’s Patch AND a General’s Order! Prizes will be paid out to the winners by Wednesday, April 17th at 11:00pm PDT.
Vermillion Cores are also on sale now for 25% off, so there truly has never been a better time to upgrade your buildings to Level 15!

As a reminder, you have until 11:59pm PST TONIGHT (October 8th) to enter in for a chance to win 10,000 FREE PLATINUM by making a platinum purchase! Every 100 platinum purchased before the event end gives you an entry to win! There is no limit on the number of entries! Five lucky winners will be chosen on October 9th and platinum prizes will be distributed that same day!

Start researching now and crush those Bombas!

Today is the Last Day to Participate in our latest Troop Training and General SP Force Tournament!

Platinum Prize Box - Guarantees a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, or Onyx Core
Gold Prize Box - Chance to win a Level 16 Black Market Patch, Generals Order, Incineraptor, Synthetic Control Core, Onyx Core, Hacker's Patch, Vermillion Core, Cerulean Core, or SP 5000
Silver Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from the Platinum and Gold boxes, plus a 30% Troop Accelerator, SP 1000, Incendiary Core, or Decimator Core
Bronze Prize Box - Decreased chance to win prizes from Gold and Silver Boxes plus Troops and Speed Ups
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:59 PM PDT, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

Generals are just around the corner, get a head start by winning some skill points!
From now until 11:59pm PST on November 18th, every 200 Platinum purchased will qualify you to receive an exclusive Heroes Mystery Box which will guarantee to contain at least 100 Skill Points for your General but that's not all! Skill Points can be used to level up your General's abilities which can range from passive boosts to your base to more active boosts to your troops in combat. More information on this feature can be found on the forums, so check our official announcement for more details:
<link>

Your Sector has been selected as the next Sector to receive the territorial map! The map will be active in your Sector within the next day.

The map is still a work in progress, and as such, there may still be bugs and issues to work through. Please send us your bug reports with the 'Help' link above the game window.

We're still working on the rules of the territorial map, and testing the results. There may be numerous changes over the next few weeks, and we appreciate your patience and your feedback!

Because the map is still under development, it's possible that we'll need to take the map down temporarily to fix issues or improve features. We don't expect to have any map downtime, but if we do, we'll make it as short as possible.

Visit our forums to give us your feedback!

1/23 Maintenance Update: Boost Away!

Level 14 has arrived! With it, you can build more buildings; the size of your Base will increase further, and enjoy new Campaign levels in the Defense Simulator!
Additionally, The Heavyweight Turret has had its health increased to allow it to better protect your base. The Incendiary Turret has experienced an increase in both Damage and Health to make it comparable to the Heavyweight and Sniper Turrets. Finally, Fan Favorite troops “Specters” are enjoying a massive boost in power!
The war for Cerulea IV is escalating, capitalize on new technology, or become another statistic!

Thank you for being a part of one of the most powerful Alliances in Edgeworld!
We'd like to invite you and your Alliance members to a special preview of our newest feature on Kabam.com! Alliance Forums give you a private venue to communicate with your Alliance, plan attacks, and track your membership.
https://www.kabam.com/edgeworld/alliances/forum
Please share this information with your Alliance, and invite all your members to join us on Kabam.com!
We want your feedback and ideas about this new feature! Send your feedback to us through MOD Alpha, at ChatModAlpha@gmail.com!
This is a beta feature, and is subject to change as we receive your feedback. It's possible that we may need to clear our database before making this feature widely available, and as a result, your Alliance forums may be wiped at the end of the beta period.

Edgeworld has launched in French, Italian, German, and Spanish!
You may have seen players in your Sector chat speaking in various languages. To give you more control over your Edgeworld chat experience, we created the "Global Chat" and "My Language" chat channels.

By default, My Language is ON and Global Chat is OFF. Global Chat goes to all players in your sector who have Global Chat turned on, regardless of language.

Here are all of our current Chat channels. You can change your settings by clicking on the wrench next to the chat window.

Global Chat Color: Orange
Access Code: /w
Function: Communicates with all players in your Sector who have Global Chat enabled, regardless of language.

My Language
Color: White
Access Code: None
Function: Communicates with all players in your Sector who share your language. Note: English is a language. Currently this feature supports French, Italian, German, and Spanish; any other languages default to English.

Alliance Chat
Color: Blue
Access Code: /a
Function: Communicates with all players in your Alliance.

Group Chat
Color: Green
Access Code: /g
Function: Communicates with all players in your chat group. Click on a name in chat to invite them to your group.

Moderators
Color: Yellow
Access: Work for Kabam
Function: Moderator accounts have bright yellow text. If a Mod talks, you should listen!

Your world is made of energy! As a Sector, you have more total energy collected than any other Sector. Every member of this Sector has been awarded a 2.5-Hour Speedup!

Increase your Lifetime Force Rankings to become the Overlord and Admiral of your Sector!
Lifetime Force now provides every player with a ranking and typically an associated bonus. The Rankings and Bonuses based on your Lifetime Force in your sector are listed below:
Rank 1: Admiral; XP Boost 10% and all prior boosts Rank 2-10: Vice Admiral; 5% Building Speed Boost and all prior boosts Rank 11-30: Commodore; 5% Research / Training Speed Boost and all prior boosts Rank 31-50: Captain; 4% Research / Training Speed Boost and all prior boosts Rank 51-100: Lieutenant Commander; 3% Research / Training Speed Boost and all prior boosts Rank 101-200: Lieutenant; 2% Research / Training Speed Boost and all prior boosts Rank 201-300: Lieutenant Junior Grade; 1% Research / Training Speed Boost and all prior boosts Rank 301-400: Ensign; 5% Resource Gain Boost Rank 401-600: Chief Warrant Officer; 4% Resource Gain Boost Rank 601-800: Warrant Officer; 3% Resource Gain Boost Rank 801-1000: Chief Petty Officer; 2% Resource Gain Boost Rank 1001-5000: Crewman; 1% Resource Gain Boost Rank 5000-End: Recruit; No Boost
The Lifetime Force leaderboard rankings and associated boosts will be updated hourly.
Additionally, at 12:01am PST on the 1st of every month, the player with the highest Lifetime Force in each sector becomes Overlord of the Sector until the 1st of the next month! Besides getting designations on the Lifetime Force leaderboard, the Overlord of the Sector also gets a special Banner to display on their base and show off this distinction to any player that scouts their base. The first Overlord of the Sector will be designated at 12:01am PST on August 1st, so be sure to have the most Force in your sector by then!

Earlier today we released errant code which allowed some Kabam.com players of Edgeworld to get daily rewards multiple times. We have corrected the error, but some players exploited the error to get multiple extra Salvage Boxes. As part of the correction, we've temporarily disabled Salvage Boxes so that they are removed from the store, but they will be restored tomorrow including restoration of those legitimately acquired. Control Devices still work and are still available from the store at a discounted price.
We apologize for the error and hope to have everything back to normal shortly. We'll have a further update by noon tomorrow (Monday) Pacific time.

Temporary but devastating, Mines come to the battlefields of Cerulea IV. Place Mines around your base and they will be invisible to your enemies, but when attacking troops approach, they will explode for massive damage!
Mines are only good for one use, and any that have exploded will need to be rebuilt. However, Mines triggered during Defense Simulations will not need to be rebuilt. The number of Mines that can be built on your base at any time is determined by the level of your Factory!
Build your Mines, and give your enemies a surprise they won’t soon forget!

Commander,
Thanks to Vukice’s understanding of the Erazi communications network, I’ve been able to intercept high level Syndicate communications. I have something you'll be quite interested in.
Scyllith has a secret meeting with Grod of the Helio Legion coming up soon. It appears they've been having regular meetings for the past two months. There is no word on what they will be meeting to discuss, only that they will be in person, and alone. We need to find out what this meeting is about! If the Helio and Erazi were to combine forces, it could change the landscape of the war and not in a way we'd like.
The Secret Location is being monitored for security by an unspecified Erazi Base. We have only one option: Hit every Erazi Base we can, and plunder their Datastores until we find the right one!

Take advantage of Supercharged Defenses and level up your Heavyweight Turrets!
Supercharged Defenses have hit Cerulea IV, and now you can upgrade your Heavyweight Turrets to take advantage of this new defensive technology!
For each Heavyweight Turret upgraded to Level 17, you will win a Turret Defense Prize Box that guarantees you one of the following items: a Level 1, 5 or 15 Cerulean Blast Shield, a Level 1, 5 or 15 Cerulean Meteoric Shield, or 1.0 and 2.0 Tokens! Limit 5 boxes per player.
On top of that, for every Turret you upgrade to Level 17, you will be entered in a Platinum Sweepstakes.
10 Lucky Players will win 100 Platinum each! 3 Really Lucky players will win 500 Platinum each!
This event ends tomorrow August 30th, 2013 at 3:00pm PDT. Prizes will be awarded within 3 business days of the end of this event.

For the next 24 hours, Modder's Patches will have their effectiveness boosted by 50%! There has never been a better time to upgrade your Engineering Lab parts. Make sure to act fast and visit your engineering lab before this bonus passes you by!

Commander,
We have just received an urgent warning transmission from a nearby galaxy. It appears that a new synthetic species, known only as the Incineraptor, has been destroying colony after colony as it makes its way across the universe. The Incineraptors attack in large numbers and are extraordinarily dangerous. Unfortunately, they are now headed directly at us and show no sign of slowing down.
Our only chance for survival is to attack them head-on through the defense simulator, sir. These may be the most challenging battles that we have ever fought, but I have faith that we will be victorious in the end.
Flame on, Commander! Your Incendiary Core purchases from 3/22 to 3/25 have been doubled! Continue your upgrades to burn up your competition!

Commander, Google has recently confirmed that they will be discontinuing their Google+ Games platform. Sadly, once this occurs, Kabam Games will no longer be available on the Google+ platform. Our Team is currently formulating the best way to accommodate our Google+ Players through this transition. Please know that facilitating this as smoothly and effectively as possible is of utmost importance to us. In the meantime, we have enabled the ability to link your Google+ game account to Kabam.com. For more information on how to do this, click HERE Check back for updates to this announcement. We will let you know as soon as our plan for Google+ Players has been finalized. Thank you for your patience and your continued support of Edgeworld. - The Edgeworld Team

This coming Wednesday November 7th, we will be performing a maintenance on the Engineering Lab to address the amount of excess parts that are now present within the game. We will be deleting all duplicate and excess (and non-equipped) Level 1 Basic Lab parts, then instituting a cap of 100 max parts within Engineering Labs.
This change should not only address an error that has affected many users within their labs, but should also improve overall game performance as well!
Again, we will be performing this maintenance on Wednesday November 7th, so make sure to get your Engineering Lab in order! This action will not require any server downtime, so your gameplay shouldn't be interrupted.
Thank you for your patience during this maintenance, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

The Helio Defector, General Mako has joined your cause, and with it comes his technical prowess. Each General’s Power Armor has been augmented with new abilities!
General Strom gets the Plasma Cannon, a devastating AoE explosion that can eventually be fired at range.
General Vukice gets the Magnetic Shield, a Buff for himself and troops that provides a temporary resistance to munitions based weapons, similar to a Berserker.
Mako himself gets the Overdrive ability, giving the affected troops a short term, but sizable upgrade in damage.
These abilities aren’t part of a general’s normal repertoire, and thus require a General’s Order to be able to train and upgrade. Keep an eye out for opportunities to get your hands on this valuable item!
For more details on Mako's backstory, make sure to visit our forums!

Introducing General Thrax! This new general is a bloodthirsty Pirate Captain that spends his days traversing the universe in search of his next bounty. He has the firepower to lay waste to anything that gets in his way and powerful leadership abilities to direct his troops to attack his primary targets!
Thrax’s Focus Fire ability allows him to direct the troops nearest to him to specific spots on an enemy’s base, overcoming the magnetic effects of Trophy Buildings and turret fire!
His ultimate ability, the Energy Beam, allows him to cut straight through an enemy’s base and obliterate everything in his path!
Thrax will join the battle against your foes as long as you have a Level 17 Generals Quarters.
Check our official forums for more details including a full backstory!
What's inside? Open up to find out!

Our scientists merged Cerulean artifacts with advanced technology, and created the Pulse Tank and the Incendiary Turret! Learn more about these new weapons in our video on YouTube.

The Incendiary Turret ignites a target, burning it away until the battle ends or the target is destroyed!

The Pulse Tank transforms during combat, entering Beast Mode for extra power!

This weekend, build Incendiary Turrets and research Pulse Tanks to win! The higher your building/research level, the more chance you have to win!

Ten players in each sector who build Incendiary Turrets will win 10 Incendiary Cores!

Ten players in each sector who research Pulse Tanks will win 10 Pulse Cores!

You don't need Cores to start building these weapons, so try them out - anyone can win! We’ll announce the winners on Tuesday, October 11. Good luck!

Players have asked for updates to the Alliance map, and so we are bringing them to you! Starting today, the following changes will be in effect on the Alliance map:
1. Map nodes can now be upgraded to a maximum level of 50,000. Map nodes that are captured by an opposing player will only lose 25% of their levels.
2. Alliances can now hold a maximum of 10,000 nodes. Alliances that currently control more than 10,000 nodes cannot take control of more nodes until they fall below this 10,000 node maximum.
3. The Alliance doubling bonus from holding the maximum number of nodes has been removed.
4. All level requirements for attacking nodes have been removed.
Enjoy these new updates to the map as your Alliance vanquishes the competition!

Commander,
Remember when I told you that we had a safe and environmentally sound way of disposing of our research chemicals? About that...
The Terraknor may or may not have all died off due to some sort of chemical induced illness. We're lucky that the chemicals had a different effect on one of the other local creatures. They've become huge, and aggressive.
I call them "Lancers".
We should be able to use our old Control Devices to weaponize these new creatures, assuming we survive their initial assault. Get to the Defense Simulator. Break them.

The new Loot Forge game allows you to use platinum to win fantastic prizes including Cerulean Cores, Incendiary Cores, Mystery Boxes, ANNIHILATOR CRATES and even PLATINUM! Zoot, of course!

In addition to all the bonuses you normally enjoy, upgrading your Command Center to level 13 will increase the size of your base by over 23% and give it an awesome new look!
Finally, you will have more room for more Turrets, Mines, and the infrastructure you will need to rule your Sector! All of these can now be upgraded to level 13 as well!
Upgrade your buildings to level 13 today!

In a few minutes, the Edgeworld servers will briefly be taken down for maintenance and updates.

Please check our Twitter feed for more information, and the exact time that we expect to start the update!

Try not to have any Combat Boosts active during the update, as you will lose valuable boost time.

If you are in the middle of combat when the update starts, you may be unable to attack when you return to the game. This should pass within a half hour.

Send us a support ticket with the "Help" button above the game window if you have any issues or questions!

Alliance Activity Log

Commander,
We have spotted an unidentified aircraft near our borders. This craft bears no resemblance to any current Union technology. Historical records show greatest semblance to an earth land vessel known as a “sleigh”.
This craft was shot down by Maar forces, but our troops were able to rescue the pilot. Our troops couldn’t identify the pilot due to extensive injuries, but the pilot was reported as being…rotund…and wearing a peculiar red hat. We have placed the pilot in a regeneration chamber, but we will be unable to learn more about the pilot until they are fully healed.
Faction forces are advancing on our position. I believe they want to capture the pilot! Get to the defense simulator and protect the base!

Spend 500 to 999 Platinum to receive 2 FREE Incendiary Core! Spend 1000 to 1999 Platinum to receive 4 FREE Incendiary Cores! Spend 2000 or more Platinum to receive 8 FREE Incendiary Cores!!
Use the Cores to build and upgrade your Sniper Towers to the max! A Level 12 Sniper Tower deals 2500 damage per shot, and has a health of 8750.

Cerulean Spread Fire is a new Smart part that has been added to your Engineering Lab Arsenal!
The Cerulean Spread Fire Smart Part is equipped with a brand new Smart AI, aimed at spreading various status effects (like Concussion and burning) to troops and Generals that are currently unaffected by these ailments. Applying this Smart part to the right turret can grant you an unprecedented amount of Crowd Control and help strengthen your defense against even the deadliest of foes!
The Spread Fire also comes with an increase to Splash Radius and Targets, further helping you spread status effects to the maximum number of units.
Simply purchase the Cerulean Spread Fire Box for a chance to take home this powerful new item. This box will only be available for a Limited Time, so make sure to act now before it's too late!

Here at Kabam we do our best to support highly effective charities around the world. In an effort to bring that opportunity to our players and to honor Memorial Day in the U.S., we will be making a *limited edition* charity bundle to benefit Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA) available in the store starting today.
The bundle will contain the following items:
1 x Vermillion Core 1 x Scarbide Rack 1 x 30% Training Accelerator
This is a savings of nearly 200%!
When the sale concludes on Sunday June 2nd, 100% of the IAVA Charity Bundle’s net proceeds will be donated to Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America on behalf of the Kabam community to support IAVA's healthcare, scholarship and job training programs!
Thank you for your support, and we hope you have a great Holiday!
Edgeworld Team

Thanks to your vocal support in the forums, Monoceros has been selected as the next Sector to receive the territorial map!

The map is still a work in progress, and as such, there may still be bugs and issues to work through. Please send us your bug reports with the 'Help' link above the game window.

We're still working on the rules of the territorial map, and testing the results. There may be numerous changes over the next few weeks, and we appreciate your patience and your feedback!

Because the map is still under development, it's possible that we'll need to take the map down temporarily to fix issues or improve features. We don't expect to have any map downtime, but if we do, we'll make it as short as possible.

Visit our forums to give us your feedback!

A Builder's Box contains the chance to win a Cerulean Core, a Speed Up or a Zoot's Token!
Please note that all prizes will be paid out to the Sector in which the faction bases were defeated. Prizes will be distributed by July 11th.
Have a good weekend, Commander!
Engineering Lab Upgrade Times Reduced by 95% for a Limited Time!

For a limited time only, Tesla Tower build times will be reduced by 30% and levels 10-15 will not require Incendiary cores in order to upgrade! There has never been a better time to power up these Towers and increase your base defenses.
This event will only last for the next 2 days, so take advantage of these build times now and finish your builds before it's too late!

With Halloween just around the corner, Control Devices are now on Sale!
For the next 24 hours, these Controls can be had for only 5 Platinum! Make sure to check the "Featured" or "Combat" section of the shop to get yours and stock up today!

With the release level 16 Engineering Lab Parts, your turrets and defenses have never been stronger! Leveling up to Level 16 can be done naturally through the Engineering Lab, but if you need any help then look no further then the Black Market Patch Mystery Box! This new Patch will guarantee an upgrade from Level 15 - 16, and can only be found inside this box!
Open one of these to take home this exclusive item, but that's not all!
This box can also contain Hacker's Patches to help get your lab parts up to level 15, Decimators, and other troop bundles that all will provide XP when opened!
This box will only be available for a Limited Time so don't miss out! Visit the featured tab of the store and get yours today!

Now is the perfect time to upgrade your buildings to Level 15 and prepare for what the future holds!
For a limited time, each completed Level 15 building upgrade on one of your colonies between now and 11:00pm PDT on April 15th gives you a chance to take home great prizes! Ten randomly chosen players who successfully complete a Level 15 building upgrade will take home a Hacker’s Patch AND a General’s Order!
Prizes will be paid out to the winners by Wednesday, April 17th at 11:00pm PDT.
There has never been a better time to upgrade your buildings to Level 15 and quickly catch up with other players!
Level 10 Turret Build-a-thon!

With the unveiling of the new and powerful Incineraptors, many players inquired about their research. Here is your chance to take home some Synthetic Control Cores, necessary to power up your Incineraptors and enable their Research! Other items and Troop Bundles can be won as well such as large amounts of Bombas, Shrikes, Titans as well as Scarbide Ingots that each will help you during this latest Force Tournament!
The only way to get Synthetic Control Cores currently is through this Mystery Box, and will only be available for a Limited Time! Visit the featured tab of the shop to get yours today!

In this new Incineraptor and Core Box, you can win both untrainable, exclusive Incineraptor troops as well as Synthetic Control Cores for Incineraptor research! You can also win other troops including Battle Cruisers, Bombas, Shrikes and Titans that will help you during this latest Force Tournament!
This great mystery box will only be available for a Limited Time, so visit the featured tab of the shop to get yours today!

With the release of our new "Force System Mechanic", a brand new 5 DAY Force Tournament has just begun!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, General Skill upgrading and PvP will contribute to your leaderboard ranking, with the top 40 netting fabulous prizes such as Platinum, Trophies, and premium troops!
This Tournament ends on March 4th at 10:00 AM PDT, and if you have any questions on the new force system make sure to visit our forums and check your in game mail for more details. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

For a limited time only, the Caldera-2 Colony is on sale in the Edgeworld Store for all-time low price of 299 Platinum!

Commander,
We would like to thank you very much for playing Edgeworld Mobile, but regret to inform you that we will not be continuing to support the game. As a result, Edgeworld Mobile will be concluding on June 24th, 2013. Sadly, after a long and arduous trek, the Campaign for Cerulea IV is coming to a close.
We hope you enjoyed your time within the game and that you will continue to play other Kabam games, current and future!
For more information regarding the closure of Edgeworld Mobile, check out our FAQs located here:
General FAQ
http://community.kabam.com/forums/showthread.php?181521-Edgeworld-Mobile-Closure-FAQ
Paying Player FAQ
http://community.kabam.com/forums/showthread.php?181519-Edgeworld-Mobile-Paying-Player-FAQ
We also have a General Discussion section of the Edgeworld Mobile Message Boards available where you can discuss or ask any questions you may have:
http://community.kabam.com/forums/forumdisplay.php?793-General-Discussion
Thanks again for supporting Edgeworld Mobile and we hope to see you again very soon!
Best wishes,
-The Edgeworld Mobile Team

In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
This Tournament ends tonight at 11:00 PM PST, Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

An accidental change on our end has caused Advanced Armor and Advanced Ammunition to return to the Edgeworld store!
These items will give a permanent increase to your troop strength and building health. They were removed from the store in December, and have been unavailable since then.
To be fair and give all our players a chance to take advantage of the error and get these unavailable items, we've decided to leave these items in the store until the end of the month. We'll remove Advanced Armor and Ammunition at the start of April.
Thanks for playing Edgeworld!

I swear, you try to do ONE marketing promotion, and that schmuck Mallick decides to turn the AA guns on you. This is why he doesn’t get the deals that you do. Ah, well. You know what they say. He knows when you’re sleeping, he knows when you’re awake. He knows if you’ve been bad or good, and he also knows WHETHER or NOT you bothered to lift a finger to protect him while he was in the regeneration tank! If ya did, you’re a real mensch, and you should check your inventory, because I left ya a gift. There it is. Don’t ever let it be said that old Zoot never gave you anything. You know, except for a random item EVERY. FREAKING. DAY. Anyway, when you’re done kicking some poor sod’s teeth in, you should swing by my place. I might have something special for you…or not! You’ll just have to see. Your pal Santa Zoot

Version 2.0 of the Edgeworld Force Tournament System is now live and Lifetime Force will be continuously calculated for player actions even when Tournaments are not running.
Upgrading Buildings, upgrading Research, Spawning Troops, Upgrading Equipment, Upgrading General's Skills and PvP will now always award players with Lifetime Force.
Tournament scores will continue to only record select categories of Force depending on the Tournament Type. For example Buildings and Research Tournaments will only consider and calculate scores from Buildings and Research Force; Troop Training and Equipment Tournaments will only consider and calculate scores from Training and upgrading Equipment.
Retroactive Total Lifetime Force scores are now in process of calculation and an update will be provided when Total Lifetime Force scores for all players has been completed.
Thank you so much players for your continued support of Edgeworld!

General Strom’s exo-armor has undergone a major upgrade and has two new powers at his disposal: Teleport and Ballistic Missiles. Armed with these two active skills, he is an even stronger force to reckon with!

The Teleport skill allows the General to instantly move to a new location on the enemy base. Once Teleport reaches level 10+, this skill can be charged to teleport not only the General, but also the troops around him!

Ballistic Missile allows you call in air support for the General, damaging all builds in a radius around Strom. When Ballistic Missile is level 10+, this skill can be charged to increase the size of the area of damage.

To unlock these skills, simply collect Skill Points from PvP attacks and spend them in the General’s Quarters on your base!

Each Elite Weapons Box contains ONE brand new Engineering Lab part. There are a total of 40 parts in this box, and each one is a winner. Try your luck today!

Level 17 has arrived, and with it some new additions! You will see a greater increase in the power of your Troops, Buildings, Engineering Lab Parts and Generals, a larger Base Size, and significantly increased Warp Gate capacities at Level 17, so it is essential that you start upgrading your base today!
Furthermore, in addition to being able to build more of most turret types, you can now build up to 4 Bunkers with a Level 17 Command Center! Garrison troops in these new Bunkers to fortify your base’s defenses!
In order to access these new levels, the Ruby Core has been released! The only way to get this new Core is to win it in the Wheel Game, so be sure to check out the Wheel Game today!
The war for Cerulea IV is escalating, capitalize on this new technology or become another statistic!

Have you wished that your Sniper Turrets could attack multiple targets at once, or that your Incendiary Turrets could have splash damage? Now you can! With the Engineering Lab, you can find new modification parts in the Defense Simulator and use the Lab to equip them to your various Turret types. In addition, you can upgrade them with resources for greater effect! More health? Further range? More damage? Splash damage? You can have all that and more! For full details on how to make the most of this great new feature, click Here Give your enemies a nasty surprise with the Engineering Lab. Build yours today!

Each player can qualify and receive up to a max of 10 Incineraptors
Don't forget to check out the Synthetic Control Core Mystery Box in the featured tab of the shop. While the Incineraptors are strong on their own, just imagine the hidden power these Cores will unlock through increased research!

From now on, you will have three base configurations to choose from when you move to a new sector: Basic, Advanced and Elite!
Basic: Includes Level 1 Buildings such as the Command Center, Crystal Mine, Gas Refinery, Warp Gate, Staging Area and Defense Simulator!
Advanced: Includes Level 5 Buildings such as the Command Center, Defense Lab, Tech Lab, Barracks, Warp Gate, Staging Area, Engineering Lab, 18 turrets and much more! Get 1,500+ levels of experience FREE!
Elite: Includes Level 8 Buildings such as the Command Center, Defense Lab, Tech Lab, Barracks, Warp Gate, Staging Area, Generals Quarters, 36 turrets and much more! Get 3,500+ levels of experience FREE!
Take advantage of these great offers when joining a new sector and get ahead of the competition today!

Looking for a boost in the Training Force Tournament? We’ve got three new Troop Mystery boxes that will guarantee you a minimum amount of Force when opened!
The Use the Force Box contains a minimum of 10,000 Force Points when opened and has the chance for amazing Force amounts up to 500,000 Force Points! Open this box to unlock troops worth 10K, 25K, 50K, 100K, 250K or 500K Force! For the low price of 20 Platinum, you have the opportunity to blaze your way up the Force Tournament ladder in seconds!
Troops available include Pulse Tanks, Berzerkers, Decimators, Battlecruisers and Incineraptors!
We are also unveiling the 50K Force Box and the 100K Force Box that guarantees you big Force gains and elite troops!
The 50K Force Box guarantees you over 50,000 Force Points when opened and could include Berzerkers, Decimators and Incineraptors!
The 100K Force Box guarantees you over 100,000 Force Points when opened and could catapult you up to the top of the Leaderboard in no time!
These boxes are only available for a limited time so be sure to stock up today and eliminate your competition!

Still looking to unlock and upgrade more equipment for your Engineering Lab? Here's your chance to win some powerful Dual Targeting Parts with our newest addition, the Vulcan Box!
Dual Targeting Parts will target more then one unit with each Turret attack. The amount of targets can be increased through upgrade levels, so imagine what these upgrades can do for your sniper turrets!
Some of these parts can contain more then one property, like Frozen Dual Barrels! This item will not only shoot multiple targets but can also freeze them in place! Make sure to check our the Vulcan Box today to get your hands on these Lab Parts but don't delay. The Vulcan Box will only be available for a Limited Time!

We have adjusted the amount of XP gained from the Defense Simulator, so starting today you will receive much more XP from each Simulation! Make sure to take advantage of this opportunity to gain extra levels and earn more equipment for your Engineering Lab!
-- Edgeworld Team

Commander,
Remember when I told you that we had a safe and environmentally sound way of disposing of our research chemicals? About that...
The Terraknor may or may not have all died off due to some sort of chemical induced illness. We're lucky that the chemicals had a different effect on one of the other local creatures. They've become huge, and aggressive.
I call them "Lancers".
We should be able to use our old Control Devices to weaponize these new creatures, assuming we survive their initial assault. Get to the Defense Simulator. Break them.

From 3/22 to 3/26, every 500 Platinum spent will earn you a FREE KIRA'S GIFT!
Wise Platinum use is the mark of a great Commander. KIRA is rewarding your strategy with a free KIRA's Gift for every 500 Platinum spent!
Just spend Platinum between now and midnight 3/26 PST (7am 3/27 UTC) to receive your free KIRA's Gifts! The more Platinum spent, the more Gifts you'll receive!
Visit the 'Get Platinum' page to view our Platinum packages! Each one comes with BONUS Platinum and items!

There is a new Force Tournament starting today with AMAZING prizes! It will last for 4 DAYS and provide you with a 3x boost to Building and Training!
All Force earned through troop training, building, researching, equipment upgrading, and General Skill upgrading will contribute to your Tournament AND Leaderboard rankings but that's not all! In addition, Building and Training Force Points will be TRIPLED (x3) for the duration of the tournament!
The top 40 players on each sector will each qualify for Prizes, the most ever from any Force Tournament!
Items such as Ruby Cores, Black Market Patches, Generals Orders and other building Cores can be won but that's not all! We will also be giving out a box to the top players in each sector that is GUARANTEED to include Cerulean Alloys, Fireproof Shield Tokens or Hacker's Patches! The Fireproof Shield Tokens protect your turrets against damage from Bomba units! Make sure to check the Tournament Leaderboard in game for an exact breakdown on the new prize structure.
In addition to these overall prizes, Daily Prizes will be available for the top 3 players in a given day as well as Achievement Prizes that can be warned once you pass certain Force Thresholds! Check the in game leaderboard for this breakdown as well.
This Tournament ends on August 10th at 11:00 PM PST, so be sure to get started today. Good luck!
-- Edgeworld Team

For a Limited Time only the New Renegade Mystery Box will be avilable within the shop! For 10 Platinum comes the chance to win a Renegade Crate, but that's not all! Other great items are available within including Berserkers, 8x XP Boosts, Accelerators and more!

Commander, we are receiving a resupply from the fleet. It’s the schematics for a new defensive structure!
Introducing the advanced and powerful Anti-Tank turret! This turret fires modified Electromagnetic Pulse rounds. These bullets are capable of frying the circuitry of mechanical units, such as those built in the Factory.
They have no effect, however, on the biological based units from the Barracks, or the units from the Fleet Academy, due to their hardened circuitry and failsafe redundancy systems.
Add a powerful new strategy to your defensive arsenal, with the Anti-Tank Turret! Build yours today!

For every 200 Platinum that you spend between now and 11:59pm PDT on April 18th, you will receive one FREE Hacker’s Patch!
Each player can receive up to a total of 10 Hacker’s Patches from this event. The prizes will be distributed onto the server in which Platinum was spent and added to your Inventory within 3 business days of this event's conclusion.

Earlier this afternoon, due to issues with our external data center provider many kabam.com games including Edgeworld experienced an outage of approximately two hours. Though these issues were largely out of our own control, we deeply sympathize with the many players who were inconvenienced by the outage. Please find in your inventory: one Bomba Box and one of the NEW and Improved Kira's Gifts as a small token of appreciation to you, our players, for your patience and continued loyalty to Edgeworld.
We sincerely apologize to all of our affected players and will do our best to minimize these types of issues going forward. THANK YOU all for choosing to play our game!
- Edgeworld Team

New "Monument" Buildings are now available, using Platinum, Gold, Silver, and Bronze trophies to build and upgrade! Immortalize your past tournament triumphs into permanent structures within your base for all to see!
These buildings are not merely cosmetic, however, but can be powerful additions to your defense! Enemy troops who come in range of your Monuments will be forced to immediately switch fire and target the building, adding a new strategic element to base attack and defense!
Monuments require "Trophies" won from Force Tournaments and Contests to build and upgrade, so make sure to keep an eye out for your next chance to get your hands on some!

This Tournament ends on April 17th at 11:00 PM PDT so get started today. Good luck!

Hey all,
We here at Kabam have been watching closely as the destruction and tragedies of Hurricane Sandy have been unfolding on the East Coast. We have also been moved by the compassion and response demonstrated by the efforts to raise money in support of the relief and aid of those affected. In support of these efforts and in response to this disaster, Edgeworld, as well as other Kabam games, will be collecting donations through the sale of Relief items.
We will be making available in the shop a "Sandy Relief Crate" which will contain the following items:
3x Decimator Racks, 3x 30% Training Accelerators, and 5x Zoot's Minigame Tokens!
100% of the net proceeds received from the mystery box sales will go towards the Red Cross for Hurricane Relief Charity.
When all sales are complete, we will make the donation to the Red Cross on the behalf of the Kabam Community and Kabam, Inc., to the victims of Hurricane Sandy. We hope that you will join us in this effort to raise donations for those affected by this tragedy.
Thank you,
The Edgeworld Team Kabam, Inc.

Our Scouts have uncovered the ruins of an abandoned Cerulean Base located in a previously unknown Barren Landscape on Cerulea IV. Many Craters dot the landscape, but evidence suggests that these were not from celestial impact but from localized explosives.
What was so important that the Celureans destroyed these structures on their way out?
No better way to find out then to claim this Outpost for our own! Simply obtain the Caldera-2 schematic, then you can begin construction in this new location!

Two new powerful parts have been made available for the Engineering Lab, Cerulean Damage Sensors and Cerulean Central Protection Parts!
Cerulean Damage Sensors will greatly increase your turret's Range and Damage but that's not all! These parts come equipped with a "Smart" AI that will cause your turrets to target units with the "lowest" health, almost assuredly finishing them off.
Cerulean Central Protection parts will greatly increase Splash Radius and provide multi-targeting capabilities, but once again there's more. The Central Protection's Smart AI will automatically switch to and target any units that take a shot towards your command center, further aiding in your base defense
The only way to acquire these items are through our new Smart Part Mystery Crate! This crate will not only give you a chance to take home this new premium part, but can also net you other great items like General SP Racks and Hacker's Patches! Visit the featured tab of the store to get yours today!

Ceti Alpha 7, the newest Sector in Cerulea IV, is now open for battle!
Ceti Alpha 7 is the newest territorial expansion in Edgeworld and is open for players to compete for dominance! Enter this new sector, build up your base, form an alliance and dominate the map to gain control of the sector!
Remember, you have three new Base configurations to choose from on Ceti Alpha 7: Basic, Upgraded and Elite!
Basic: Includes Level 1 Buildings such as the Command Center, Crystal Mine, Gas Refinery, Warp Gate, Staging Area and Defense Simulator!
Upgraded: Includes Level 5 Buildings such as the Command Center, Defense Lab, Tech Lab, Barracks, Warp Gate, Staging Area, Engineering Lab, 18 turrets and much more!
Elite: Includes Level 8 Buildings such as the Command Center, Defense Lab, Tech Lab, Barracks, Warp Gate, Staging Area, Generals Quarters, 36 turrets and much more!
Take advantage of these great offers when joining Ceti Alpha and get ahead of the competition today!

The Cerulean Damage Sensor is a smart AI equipment that fires ultra high powered beams that incinerate incoming troops. The Smart AI targets troops with weakened defenses to effectively get rid of all vulnerable threats. In addition to this Smart AI, the part itself will also greatly increase your turret's Range and Damage!
Purchase a Sensor Box today for a chance to win one of these rare parts and vanquish your enemies today. Other items in the Sensor Box include Hacker's Patches and Accelerators.
The Sensor Box is only available until 2/25/2013

We are happy to announce the newest addition to your forces, the Chimera!
Chimera are powerful, long range units that put Specters to shame! Additionally, due to their elite training they require far less Uranium for their training time than a normal troop.
Chimera are trained in a new building, called the Fleet Academy, which has its own Training Queue. This means that you can gain Training XP Faster and be more of a force on the Maps!
In order to build your Flight Academy in your HQ, you will need a level 12 Command Center and a level 12 Barracks.
What are you waiting for? Unleash the Chimera and rule the skies of Cerulea IV!

Congratulations, Commander! We appreciate your support of Edgeworld! Our supplies of Erazi Smuggler's Crates have not arrived yet, so we've granted you the even-more-valuable KIRA's Gift! Check your inventory for your new item, and thank you for purchasing Platinum!

Congratulations, Commander! Your Aurora-1 Command Center has been chosen as a winner in our upgrade contest! We apologize for the delay, and we also discovered that some of our original winners may have received 8-Hour Shields instead of Accelerators. We're re-awarding the prizes now! You've received a number of 8-Hour Accelerators equal to your Aurora-1 Command Center level. Enjoy your newfound speed!

There have been TWO significant improvements made to the turrets in Edgeworld! First, Level 17 turrets have been made MUCH stronger than Level 16 turrets! With impressive boosts to damage and health stats, it is necessary to upgrade all of your turrets to Level 17 in order to maintain your dominance on Cerulea IV!
Second, from now on, turrets do not require an Incendiary Core for Level 1 builds! This means that you can build Level 1 Incendiary Turrets, Sniper Towers, Heavyweight Turrets, Corrosive Turrets and Anti-Tank Turrets without an Incendiary Core!
Start building and upgrading these turrets today to make your base the strongest in all of Edgeworld!

Neutron Mines have been rebalanced, receiving buffs to their overall effectiveness!
No longer will your mine detonate on impact, and has become a permanent structure and part of your base defense! The attack power of these Mines has also been increased with each upgrade level, granting you even more bang for your buck above any other single turret in the game!
The requirements for building Neutron Mines will remain the same, so make sure to check them out if you have a Level 9 or higher factory...and if you don't, what are you waiting for? Build and upgrade your mines today before your enemies take advantage!

Hey all, We here at Kabam do our best to support great charities around the world. In an effort to bring that opportunity to our players, we will be making a "Doctors Without Borders" charity crate available in the store today and give 100% of the item’s net proceeds to the Doctors Without Borders charity!
The crate will contain the following items:
1x Decimator Rack, 1x Incendiary Rack and 1x 30% Training Accelerators!
This is a 235 platinum value for only 99 platinum! When the sale concludes on Wednesday, March 20, we will make a donation to Doctors Without Borders on behalf of the Kabam Community.
We hope that you will join us in this effort to raise donations for this great organization.
Thank you, The Edgeworld Team Kabam, Inc.

Today we are happy to announce the launch of an exciting new feature, Engineering Lab Part Enhancements! Now you will have the ability to further customize your Engineering Lab Parts and by extension your base defenses to further combat your enemies in Edgeworld.
What exactly are Enhancements?
Enhancements are additional bonuses that can be applied to your existing Engineering Lab Parts through the use of new "Enhancement Tokens". Each Lab part now will have 2 available Enhancement Slots, so if you fill these slots your existing parts will instantly become more powerful!
These Enhancement Tokens will not provide flat bonuses, however, but are tied to the Upgrade level of the Engineering Lab part it is attached to. This means that these bonuses will scale along with the upgrade level of the part, and will increase just like any normal part stat.
Here are the steps to take in order to get started:
1. Visit the "Parts" tab within your Engineering Lab and left click on the desired Engineering Lab Part to bring up the item menu 2. Select the new "Enhancements" option 3. Here you will see a list of Enhancement Tokens you either own or are able to purchase. Click on the desired token and click "Enhance" to add the effect to your Engineering Lab Part! 4. Now you can view the extra stats that have been added to your part, and once equipped will instantly increase your defense!
How can you get your hands on these new tokens? Currently there are 2 ways!
1. 3 basic tokens will initially be available for purchase in the Enhancement Screen of each part. -Armor Token - Applies a small scaling Health Boost -Piercing Ammo Token - Applies a small scaling Damage Boost -Explosive Ammo Token - Applies a small scaling Boost to Splash Radius
2. In addition to these basic tokens, 5 others will be available through the Wheel Game! These following 5 possess a higher power level then the previous 3 listed: -Armor Token 2.0 - Applies a larger scaling Health Boost -Piercing Ammo Token 2.0 - Applies a larger scaling Damage Boost -Explosive Ammo Token 2.0 - Applies a larger scaling Boost to Splash Radius -Scope Token - Applies a bonus to the part's Range -Liquid Coolant - Applies a bonus to the part's Attacks per Minute

Zoot claims to have possibly found an....unsavory....way to reproduce a valuable piece of Cerulean Technology--the Incendiary Core. This involves the remains of a Pyro that has died in a very particular way--Horribly. In order to make this experiment a success, he needs visual evidence in order to confirm which Pyros met the criteria. Respond to this thread with screenshots and video captures of the most savage, gruesome display of...test subjects. Zoot will open up his stockpiles and provide a Cerulean Rack to the five commanders who provide the best material as well as their Name and Sector before Friday, September 7th at 12:00pm PST Disclaimer: Submissions become the property of Zoot in order for research purposes, and possibly an intergalactic pay-per-view event. For full rules and to submit your entry, click here!
